_meanings:
(Usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>)
Holding, carrying, bearing, 
wearing, containing, possessing, endowed 

with, preserving, observing, &c.;
as in {#akzaDara, aMSuDara, gadADara, gaMgADara#},
{#mahIDara, asfgDara, divyAMbaraDara#}, &c.

{@--4@} The
king of the tortoises, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} Viṣṇu
in his Kūrma incarnation.
